text.div:
Expansion performed internally based on codesystem SMART Guidelines Persona Types v0.2.0 (CodeSystem)

This value set contains 4 concepts

CodeSystemDisplayDefinition
  keyhttp://smart.who.int/base/CodeSystem/SGPersonaTypesKey PersonaKey Persona for workflows in this DAK
  relatedhttp://smart.who.int/base/CodeSystem/SGPersonaTypesRelated PersonaRelated Personas that don't directly enact in any workflow in this DAK
  systemhttp://smart.who.int/base/CodeSystem/SGPersonaTypesSystemDigital Systems that interact in this DAK
  hardwarehttp://smart.who.int/base/CodeSystem/SGPersonaTypesHardware DeviceHardware devices required to perform workflows in the DAK
